function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher number of calls per 100,000 people per month indicate an increase in contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases leading to public health crisis","Mitigation":"Implement effective public health measures and awareness campaigns to reduce the spread of contagious diseases","Technologies":"Public health surveillance, contact tracing, and vaccination programs","People":"General public, public health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Incorporating time-variant factors may not fully capture the evolving nature of contagious diseases","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling and prediction of disease propagation, leading to ineffective control measures","Mitigation":"Regularly update and improve the model with real-time data on disease transmission and other relevant factors","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, and real-time disease tracking systems","People":"Data scientists, public health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Data scientists, public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Robust standard errors and alternative cluster constructions may affect the accuracy of the findings","Impact":"Misinterpretation of research results and policy implications","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analyses and validate results using different clustering methods, and robustness checks","Technologies":"Statistical software for sensitivity analysis and robustness checks","People":"Researchers, statisticians, policymakers","Owner":"Researchers, statisticians, research institutions"}]}
